page.title: 20Law and Order
page.content: Law and order mainly concerns the police,but it also concerns the public.The police forces part is to detect and prevent crime.They go to football matches to control crowds, they have horses to help with crowd control at street demonstrations. There are about 70,000 policemen in England.They patrol on the beat,in cars,on motorbikes,horses and in helicopters. The public part is to inform the police,keep a lookout and try to stop crimes. Our area is worked out,firstly on the number of people living here and secondly on the mileage to be covered. Our local policeman patrols in a car. In a village he parks the car and walks around.He protects life and property deals with petty vandalism, accidents and burglaries.
